translation.explanation: A series broadcast on TV or the internet. Korean dramas are popular worldwide.

examples.intermediate: Drama / TV Series is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through drama / tv series, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of drama / tv series helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: A visual work shown in theaters. Can be watched at the cinema or at home.

examples.intermediate: Movie / Film is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through movie / film, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of movie / film helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Reading material in paper or electronic form. Contains knowledge or stories.

examples.intermediate: Book is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through book, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of book helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Art created with sound. Includes songs, instrumental performances, etc.

examples.intermediate: Music is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through music, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of music helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Stage art performed in front of an audience. Includes plays, concerts, musicals, etc.

examples.intermediate: Performance / Show is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through performance / show, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of performance / show helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Culture or customs passed down from the past. Handed down from one generation to the next.

examples.intermediate: Tradition is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through tradition, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of tradition helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: A day specially celebrated. Korea's major holidays are Lunar New Year and Chuseok (Korean Thanksgiving).

examples.intermediate: Holiday / Festival is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through holiday / festival, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of holiday / festival helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Korean traditional clothing. Worn on holidays or special occasions.

examples.intermediate: Hanbok is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through hanbok, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of hanbok helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: Korea's representative food and culture. A traditional side dish made by fermenting cabbage or radish. UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage.

examples.intermediate: Kimchi is part of Korean culture.
examples.advanced: Through kimchi, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of kimchi helps understand Korean society more deeply.

translation.explanation: The writing system for Korean language. Created by King Sejong. Known as a scientific and easy-to-learn script.

examples.advanced: Through hangul, you can understand Korean culture.
examples.master: Knowing the history and meaning of hangul helps understand Korean society more deeply.
